title: Show 254 - *Anthony Scaramucci - LIVE*
itunes:title: Show 254 - *Anthony Scaramucci - LIVE*
itunes:subtitle: Oh boy. This will knock your socks off. The hurricane that is The Mooch whirls into London for this gripping, hilarious and heartfelt show. Packed full of incredible stories from inside the Trump White House and never-before-heard details about Steve B...
description:
Oh boy. This will knock your socks off. The hurricane that is The Mooch whirls into London for this gripping, hilarious and heartfelt show. Packed full of incredible stories from inside the Trump White House and never-before-heard details about Steve Bannon, this is even better than you'd hope. It's a fantastic analysis of recent American politics, including how Trump appealed to blue collar America and why Anthony was initially attracted to the project. Anthony charts the deterioration of his relationship with Trump and his horror at some of the shocking moments in the last few years. Nothing can prepare you for this. 

 

Follow Anthony on Twitter: @Scaramucci

 

NEW GUESTS ANNOUNCED FOR THE POLITICAL PARTY LIVE:

 

6 Dec: Jeremy Hunt

20 Dec: Jacob Rees-Mogg, Rosena Allin-Khan and MP4

10 Jan: Neil Kinnock

 

Buy tickets to The Political Party, live at The Duchess Theatre including the next show with JEREMY HUNT on Monday 6 December here: https://www.nimaxtheatres.com/shows/the-political-party-with-matt-forde/

 

Email the show: politicalpartypodcast@gmail.com

 

Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde

 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
